entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm along the Strait. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
